hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Salamah that 'Aishah said:"If the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) wanted to sleep while he was Junub, he would perform Wudu', and if he wanted to eat or drink," she said: "he would wash his hands and then eat or drink

chapter.ara-name: باب اقْتِصَارِ الْجُنُبِ عَلَى غَسْلِ يَدَيْهِ إِذَا أَرَادَ أَنْ يَأْكُلَ أَوْ يَشْرَبَ
chapter.eng-name: The Junub Person Washing Only His Hands When He Wants To Drink
